title: Launch an Email Campaign
description: A marketing manager needs to launch a weekly email campaign announcing new arrivals to all subscribed customers.

tasks.description: Select the email template for 'New Arrivals'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager chooses the correct email design.

tasks.description: Select the target audience (e.g., 'All Subscribed Customers').
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager defines the recipient list for the campaign.

tasks.description: Schedule the email to be sent at the desired date and time and activate the campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: The email campaign is successfully scheduled for delivery.
